name: Fog in the Forest
promptSnippet: Inspired by fog in the forest. Top cabinets: garrison gray colour with blue undertone. cabinet fronts. Bottom cabinets: Matte dark brown cabinet fronts with fine horizontal wood grain. Backsplash: Dark grey marble backsplash with a dramatic, busy pattern: mixed charcoal, grey, and subtle warm inclusions, irregular mineral texture. Floor: Medium dark grey chevron vinyl flooring with irregular tone, wood-effect finish. Soft matte finish, subtle grain, gentle variation in tone.

purpose.default: Medium dark grey chevron vinyl flooring with irregular tone, wood-effect finish

purpose.kitchen: Dark grey marble backsplash with a dramatic, busy pattern: mixed charcoal, grey, and subtle warm inclusions, irregular mineral texture.
garrison gray colour with blue undertone for top cabinets
Matte dark brown cabinet fronts with fine horizontal wood grain for bottom cabinets.
